content: >> .telegraph.co.uk/news/newstopics/howaboutthat/5350679/Cost-of-Lord-Nelsons-mnage-a-trois-shown-in-household-accounts Admiral Lord Nelson's household expense books go up for auction at Christie's next month. They cover an interesting period when Nelson was sharing his London house with Lady Emma Hamilton and her husband the former ambassador to Naples. Along with expenses recorded in the accounts, Lord Nelson was also sharing the charms of Lady Hamilton. A civilized method of banging somebody else's wife. This message has been edited. Last edited by: <NEMESIS1960>, Tue 26 May 2009 04:57 AM

title: A Grand Naval Tradition
